definition: to shed/to take off/to escape/to get away from
to get rid of/to remove/to exclude/to eliminate/to wipe out/to divide/except/not including

sentences.english: Then, the material obtained after removing cellulose was utilized to extract guttapercha.
sentences.chinese: 脱除纤维素后的杜仲材料用石油醚为溶剂提取杜仲胶。

sentences.english: A few methods for removal of residual monomers from polymer latexes were reviewed.
sentences.chinese: 综述了聚合物胶乳中残留单体的几种脱除方法。

sentences.english: Basically, low concentration of alkane background gas has no effect on the removal efficiency of malodorous gas. ?
sentences.chinese: 低浓度的烷烃背景气体对恶臭的脱除效率基本无影响。

sentences.english: The effluent is then sent to the separation section to remove the light by-product.
sentences.chinese: 流出物再送到分离段以脱除轻质副产物。

sentences.english: The process of microaldehyde deodorization for the PP transparent nucleating agent were studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了脱除聚丙烯透明成核剂中微量芳醛的方法。

sentences.english: Air stripping method was used to remove methylamines in wastewater from synthetic leather plant.
sentences.chinese: 采用空气吹脱法脱除合成革厂废水中的甲胺类化合物。

sentences.english: Fine particles in flue gas can be agglomerated by electric agglomeration.
sentences.chinese: 电凝并是提高超细粉尘颗粒脱除效率的有效方法之一。

sentences.english: Therefore, it is of great significance to study the virus-elimination technique of Pleurotus ostreatus virus.
sentences.chinese: 因此，进行平菇病毒的脱除研究具有非常重要的意义。

sentences.english: The product is an efficient paint-off mixture and can effectively remove the old paint membrane.
sentences.chinese: 本品是一种高效脱漆剂，能有效脱除旧漆层。

sentences.english: Trivalent arsenic appears to be dearsenized less easily than pentavalent arsenic.
sentences.chinese: 三价砷比五价砷较难脱除。

sentences.english: The technique parameters of removing satsuma mandarin segments membrane using enzyme were studied in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 研究利用酶制剂脱除温州蜜柑橘瓣囊衣的方法。

sentences.english: The method of removal of thiophene in coking benzene and lightbenzene by chloromethylation is studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了用氯甲基化脱除焦化苯及轻苯中噻吩的方法。

sentences.english: The high polysilicic acid can be removed by adding polyether.
sentences.chinese: 加入聚醚可脱除溶液中的高聚硅酸。

sentences.english: A process for removing basic nitrogen compounds(BNC) from RFCC diesel oil was studied by adsorption using modified activated carbon.
sentences.chinese: 用改性活性炭吸附脱除RFCC柴油中的碱性氮化物。

sentences.english: The invention solves the technical problem of the removal of chlorophyll from kale.
sentences.chinese: 解决羽衣甘蓝叶绿素的脱除的技术问题。

sentences.english: The desilication process from the sodium aluminate solution with calcium chloride is investigated by experiment.
sentences.chinese: 通过试验研究用氯化钙从铝酸钠溶液中脱除硅的过程。

definition: filtrate/solid residue produced by a filter/mud from filtering can sugar
to de-absorb/to get a chemical out of solution
thermal cleavage (i.e. sth splits when heated)
